an5.236:4.1: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
an5.236:4.5: ananuvicca apariyogāhetvā appasādanīye ṭhāne pasādaṃ upadaṃseti;
an5.236:4.6: ananuvicca apariyogāhetvā pasādanīye ṭhāne appasādaṃ upadaṃseti;
an5.236:4.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
an5.236:5.1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge.
an5.236:5.5: anuvicca pariyogāhetvā appasādanīye ṭhāne appasādaṃ upadaṃseti;
an5.236:5.6: anuvicca pariyogāhetvā pasādanīye ṭhāne pasādaṃ upadaṃseti;
an5.236:5.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge”ti.
